title: Home
description: Cain arrives as the situation with Whiteriver comes to a climax. But when the dust settles, what will become of Snow?  While Taylor and Hale are developing an intense sexual chemistry, it’s difficult for her to overlook the fact that he seems disinterested in her pregnancy.  This is an ongoing story. It is not a standalone. It is intended for readers 18+ and comfortable with ménage romance & profanity. All entries are free with Kindle Unlimited.
author: Viola Rivard
